title: Lyle Menendez denied parole a day after brother Erikâ€™s bid rejected
summary: Parole board rules against elder Menendez brother, convicted over killing parents in Los Angeles in 1989 Lyle Menendez was denied parole for his role in the 1989 killings of his parents on Friday, just a day after the California parole board denied the release of his brother Erik. California governor Gavin Newsom will have the final say in whether or not the 57-year-old will be released. Continue reading...

title: Can the new India-China bonhomie reshape trade and hurt the US in Asia?
summary: Trump's tariffs and shifting geopolitical winds have pulled India and China closer. That could undercut the US-led Quad.
